recipe.title: Orange Cucumber Salad with Sun-Dried Tomato Dressing
ingredients: 1 (4-inch) piece seedless cucumber (usually plastic-wrapped), thinly sliced crosswise
1 tablespoon finely chopped drained oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes
instructions: Cut peel, including all white pith, from oranges and cut oranges crosswise into 1/4-inch slices.
Scatter orange slices and cucumbers on a platter.
Whisk together remaining ingredients in a bowl until combined, then pour over orange slices and cucumbers.
